name: Whirling Pyro Fungus
description:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.
Due to the abundant amount of Pyro these creatures contain, they have a tendency to cause forest fires during dry seasons, and thus are considered a dangerous invasive species to the forest.

investigation.name: Fungus
investigation.description: To put it shortly, the Fungus is the congregation of overgrown and overevolved spores.\n<color=#F39000FF>Exposing it to Pyro or Electro will scorch or activate it, respectively. While in either one of said states, the Fungus will drop special materials</color>\nIt is said the infestation of Fungi is the result of a lab accident. The first Sumeru Sage had wanted to utilize spores for medical purposes. If that is true, the person had clearly underestimated the spores' adaptive and reproductive powers.
